long_description: The perfect extra layer when you're traveling, the REI Adventures Quarter-Zip top adds just the right amount of warmth for those cool nights when you're walking around town or returning from a hike. CoolMax(R) polyester is lightweight and breathable, and the wicking finish helps you stay dry and comfortable. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Shoulder seams are offset toward the back of the shirt for greater comfort when you're wearing a pack. Single chest pocket. The REI Adventures Quarter-Zip top has a classic fit that's cut just right for easy wearing.
short_description: The perfect extra layer when you're traveling, the REI Adventures Quarter-Zip top adds just the right amount of warmth for those cool nights when you're walking around town or returning from a hike.
